Keywords

Brave

  1. What is Brave?
    Brave is a new keyword ability that helps some characters protect the rest of their team. When choosing which enemy to attack, you must choose one with brave if possible.
  2. My opponent has two characters with brave that I could attack. What happens?
    You choose one of them to attack.
  3. My opponent has one tapped character and one untapped character with brave. Do I have to attack the one with brave?
    No, and in fact you can’t even if you want to. Brave doesn’t override the rules for attacking tapped/untapped characters. If your opponent has any tapped characters you must attack one of them. If a tapped character had brave, you would have to attack that one if you could.
